function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to remote interaction and reduced spatial barriers.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of diseases between remote locations and on-site locations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for on-site and remote locations, including the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and regular sanitization.","Technologies":"Telemedicine and tele-entertainment platforms, 5G networks for high-speed and low-latency communication.","People":"Medical staff, remote workers, entertainment industry professionals.","Owner":"Health organizations, telecommunication companies, entertainment companies."},{"Description":"Risk of misdiagnosis or delayed treatment in telemedicine due to potential information loss or distortion.","Impact":"Incorrect diagnosis or delayed treatment for patients, leading to worsened health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Utilize high-resolution imaging and video technologies, ensure synchronous operations between remote and on-site locations, and provide training for medical staff on telemedicine best practices.","Technologies":"High-definition imaging and video technologies, 5G URLLC for synchronous remote operations.","People":"Medical staff, patients.","Owner":"Health organizations, technology companies."},{"Description":"Potential for reduced focus on disease prevention and social distancing due to lifelike remote experiences.","Impact":"Decreased adherence to public health guidelines and increased risk of disease transmission in both remote and on-site locations.","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness on the importance of disease prevention, implement virtual social distancing measures, and encourage the use of remote technologies for essential tasks only.","Technologies":"Remote communication platforms with virtual social distancing features, educational health resources.","People":"General public, remote workers, on-site workers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, employers, technology companies."}]}
